description: Smartwool's Merino Sport 150 Tee is designed to help keep you comfortable while you’re active. It features the sweat management, temperature regulation, and odor resistance of Merino paired with the durability and quick dry time of polyester. With specialized seam construction designed to help eliminate chafing and maximize comfort while wearing a pack, you’ll be set to go far no matter your adventure.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Tee - Mens
